attributes.description:
This little  fuel saver is a must see. Very well looked after with full service history and spare keys. Perfect for every day driving. Fitted with Power steering, Air con, E/Windows, E/Mirrors, Central locking on remote, Sun roof, Multi function steering wheel, On board computer and Alloy mag wheels.

Finance available. please contact me for application or for viewing.

All vehicles sold with 1 month/1500kms warranty OR 2 year mechanical breakdown warranty as optional.

All trade-ins welcome. 

Theos Bakkie Sales.
73 Van Riebeeck Road ( Next to Nando's).
Kuilsriver.
Cape Town.
